charges.charge_description: 18:1341.F FRAUDS AND SWINDLES Starting in or about 1996 and continuing to in or about 11/06 at Lewistown in the CDIL, Dft knowingly devised and participated in a scheme and artifice to defraud and to obtain money and property by means of materially false and fraudulent pretenses: Count 1-[5/12/04] check for $259.00; Count 2-[8/11/05] check for $259.00; Count 3-[2/24/06] check for $259.00. In violation of 18 USC 1341 (1-3)

18:1344A.F BANK FRAUD On or about the dates set forth below in the CDIL and elsewhere, Dft knowingly executed and attempted to execute a scheme and artifice to defraud a financial institution and to obtain moneys and funds owned by and under the control of the financial institution by means of false and fraudulent pretenses: Count 4-[5/15/02] check for $730.00; Count 5-[10/10/02] check for $835.18; Count 6-[7/1/03] check for $1038.00; Count 7-[4/30/04] check for $792.13; Count 8-[4/30/04] check for $1083.00; Count 9-[8/11/06] check for $1183.00. All in violation of 18 USC 1344. (4-9)
